brief: This is a low pass filter.

methods.name: freq()
methods.desc: Sets the cutoff frequency for the filter.

methods.name: process()
methods.desc: Starts applying this filter to an input signal.

methods.name: res()
methods.desc:
Sets the resonance (or 'Q factor') of this filter. Increasing Q increases 
 the resonance of the filter at its cutoff frequency. Defaults to 1.

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Sets frequency and bandwidth of the filter with one method.

description: This is a low pass filter.
name: LowPass
